attributes.action: Introduce a law that requires ALL left-hand drive lorries entering the UK to have a full-length right-side wing mirror.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Innocent road users are being put at completely avoidable risk – several people are killed and many injured each year by left-hand drive lorries pulling out on motorways because they do not have full-length mirrors fitted on their right hand side so that they can see their blind spot.

It would be simple to stop many of these avoidable tragedies now – simply require all left-hand drive lorries entering the UK to have a full-length right-side wing mirror.

If they are caught without one at port of entry send them back at their own expense; if they are caught in the UK, impound the lorry until one is fitted.

Simple, quick and effective.

Let’s do it NOW.
